did.head: Collection Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Goodman Gold and Silver Mining Company.

did.abstract: One certificate for 100 shares of stock in the Goodman Gold and Silver Mining Company. Supposedly issued to Mark Twain, on June 11, 1872 by secretary Eilley Orrum and president Sandy Bowers.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Mining Certificate (MS 091). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Located in the Devil's Gate Mining District, near Virginia City, Nevada.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: One certificate for 100 shares of stock in the Goodman Gold and Silver Mining Company. Supposedly issued to Mark Twain, on June 11, 1872 by secretary Eilley Orrum and president Sandy Bowers.

controlaccess.subject: Mines and mineral resources -- Nevada -- History -- 19th century.
